sense.gloss: to stretch, to extend, to lengthen, to grow (of hair, height, grass, etc.)
to straighten out, to be flattened, to become smooth
to stretch out (e.g. of a hand), to extend
to lose elasticity, to become slack, to become soggy (e.g. noodles)
to make progress, to develop, to expand, to increase, to improve
to be exhausted, to be groggy, to pass out, to collapse
to be prolonged (meeting, life span, etc.), to be extended (e.g. deadline), to lengthen (e.g. of the days)
to be postponed, to be delayed, to be put off

sdata.j: ↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓|のビル|を↑抵当↑↓ていとう↓に↑取↑↓と↓っている。
sdata.e: The bank holds a mortgage on his building.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓↑達↑↓たち↓はそ|のビル|↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓を↑自由↑↓じゆう↓に↑使↑↓つか↓ってきた。
sdata.e: The whole building has been put at our disposal.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓はそ|のビル|↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓を↑自由↑↓じゆう↓に↑使↑↓つか↓ってきた。
sdata.e: The whole building has been put at our disposal.

sdata.j: ↑夏↑↓なつ↓には↑草↑↓くさ↓がよく↑伸↑↓|の↓びる|。
どんなに↑優雅↑↓ゆうが↓で↑堂々↑↓どうどう↓とした↑既存↑↓きそん↓|のビル|も、↑今↑↓いま↓や、その↑怪物↑↓かいぶつ↓のわきでは、ちょっと↑滑稽↑↓こっけい↓にさえ↑見↑↓み↓えるほど↑痛↑↓いた↓ましいまでに↑小↑↓ちい↓さくなってしまうだろう。
sdata.e: Even the most graceful and imposing existing buildings may now be so sadly diminished as to seem slightly ridiculous beside the monster.

sdata.j: その↑爆発↑↓ばくはつ↓はそ|のビル|に↑多大↑↓ただい↓の↑損害↑↓そんがい↓を↑与↑↓あた↓えた。
sdata.e: The explosion did a lot of damage to the building.

sdata.j: そ|のビル|は↑地震↑↓じしん↓で↑完全↑↓かんぜん↓に↑破壊↑↓はかい↓された。
sdata.e: The building was totally destroyed by the earthquake.

sdata.j: そ|のビル|は↑川↑↓かわ↓↑沿↑↓ぞ↓いに↑建↑↓た↓っている。
sdata.e: The building stands on the river.

sdata.j: そ|のビル|は↑私↑↓わたし↓たちには↑全然↑↓ぜんぜん↓↑知↑↓し↓られていない。
sdata.e: The building has not been known to us at all.

sdata.j: そ|のビル|は↑現在↑↓げんざい↓↑建設↑↓けんせつ↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓だ。
